reviews.review: With all of the other WWII shooters out there, its quite easy to miss out on this hidden gem. A long time staple of the PC shooter genre, Day of Defeat: Source adds upgrade visuals and speedier gameplay to the original, Day of Defeat. Definitely get this one as the community is still quite strong and thriving.

This game is a great valve ww2 shooter, Yes its recoil takes some getting used to, but once you get the hang of it You will have tons of fun
and the community is still alive somehow
Very good and semi-realistic WW2 fps, only bad thing-Not a big collection of weapons, nor classes.

This is a great game! Been playing for years.

It really is more fun to treat this as a goofy yet tactical and competitive World War 2 simulator, to be honest.

 Atualmente, ainda, depois de muito tempo, existem servidores brasileiros jog√°veis, e o melhor de tudo √© que eles s√£o 0% t√≥xicos, que d√° inveja em alguns games a√≠...
